change.text: Fixed several compiler warnings to improve the code readability.
Beginning work on new 'do_who' command. Right now only available for Admin
Channel command is now screenreader friendly.
Modified celebs command to tell explicitly if there are no famous people online.
All new characters passwords now requires 6 characters, one letter, and one number.
The password command now requires 6 characters, one letter, and one number.
Added improved code for illegal or bad names.
Added changes feature to be able to track changes in an XML file.
